About Me

Hello,

I'm Oliver, a resourceful Junior Front-end Web Developer with firm knowledge of latest technologies to produce clean website design. Experience handling complex HTML, CSS and JavaScript code. Mobile-first mindset with a methodical and organized approach to tasks. Meticulous learner in both instructed and independent learning and enjoys working in team-based environments.

Projects

Photon is a photography blog website built with Node.js, Express.js and MongoDB as a database. Users may log in or sign up on the website. Once logged in, users can post their own blogs and/or comment on existing blogs.

Natours is a tour booking website built using html and Sass. Users may browse different types of tours and get information regarding the tours. This demo is a purely visual experience of how this landing page would behave.

A landing page for a restaurant titled "Rawr". Rawr is a clean and alternative, healthy lifestyle restaurant. The webpage design and color palette reflect the mission statement of this restaurant.

Forkify is a recipe search application. Searching for an ingredient triggers an API call which returns all related recipes. Users may save recipes to a "likes" section for later reference. Users may also add recipe ingredients to a shopping list.

Weather-or-not is a weather web app where users can search for weather conditions in any given city. Searching a city triggers an API call which returns the current weather conditions for the city queried.
